attributes.action: Scrap Tolls on the Humber Bridge for close family visiting hospital patients - AS WITH FAMILY VISITING CRIMINALS AT HULL JAIL.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People on the south bank of the Humber do not CHOOSE to use the hospitals in Hull - why on earth should bridge tolls be paid.  It is bad enough having to pay parking charges at the hospitals.    One trip over the bridge with parking, petrol etc. can cost between £10 and £20 which is totally unacceptable.
